text:
the attached patch-file makes some changes to string-creation and -handling,
javadocs in ArabicTexthandler.

creator: info@dvholten.de
text:
Created attachment 17577
patch against svn 215909 of org.apache.batik.gvt.text.ArabicTextHandler.java

Thanks, the patch has been applied plus a couple of other
improvements.  Let me know if you want hints on other things
that might be optimized in text handling (wink, wink, nudge, nudge ;)
creator: deweese@apache.org
